title: Pa.'s state-owned universities ponder price flexibility plans; get warning about higher costs
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Education - Today 
Pennsylvania's state-owned universities are poised today to move more deeply into "pricing flexibility," an experiment supporters say helps ...
